_source.text: After a glamorous relocation (I recall we put him up at the Holiday Inn at Logan Airport for 2 weeks), I threw him some god-awful analyst report on HR technology platforms and said, "can you write something better than this crap".

text: After a glamorous relocation (I recall we put him up at the Holiday Inn at **Logan** **Airport** for 2
weeks), I threw him some god-awful analyst report on HR technology platforms and said, "can you write something **better** **than** this crap".
